backend/main.mo: Motoko canister that fetches viral prompts via HTTP outcalls, stores prompt lists, and exposes query methods including a placeholder random prompt picker.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata report linking a frontend feature update to specific files, components, and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend TypeScript, React, and utility files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme color variables and global UI styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/PLAY_STORE_RELEASE_NOTE.md: Play Store compliance and release planning document covering policies, risks, testing requirements, and operational guidance.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling navigation between list and detail views, theme syncing, and error-boundary-managed data refresh flows.
frontend/src/components/AboutDialog.tsx: Dialog component explaining the app’s relationship to viralprompts.in and its live data behavior.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: Reusable error boundary that displays detailed error UI and supports retry and cache-clearing recovery actions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer with attribution and caffeine.ai link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header with branding and controls for theme, settings, and about dialog.
frontend/src/components/PromptDetail.tsx: Displays a detailed view of a prompt with image, categories, copy/share actions, and like toggling.
frontend/src/components/PromptList.tsx: Shows a searchable, sortable grid of prompts with like/share controls and cache/error handling.
frontend/src/components/SettingsDialog.t: Provides a dialog for changing theme, spacing, image visibility, and default sort settings.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Button to toggle between light and dark themes using the theme hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login flow, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useLikedPrompts.ts: Handles storing, toggling, and checking liked prompt IDs in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages theme state, syncing with system preference and persisting to localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserSettings.ts: Stores and updates user UI settings with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useViralPrompts.ts: React Query hook that fetches viral prompts via backend, caches results, and provides refresh and cache‑clearing helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme OKLCH color variables and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that initializes React, React Query, Internet Identity, and global styles.
LocalStorage-based caching for viral prompts with get, set, timestamp, presence check, and clear operations.
frontend/src/services/viralPromptsClient: Client for fetching and validating viral prompts, including sanitization, structured errors, and JSON parsing.
frontend/src/types/viralPrompts.ts: Type definitions for ViralPrompt objects and the ViralPromptsResponse structure.
frontend/src/utils/clipboard.ts: Utility for copying text to the clipboard with fallback for older browsers.
frontend/src/utils/sharePrompt.ts: Shares a prompt via Web Share API with clipboard fallback and returns share status.
frontend/src/utils/viralPrompts.ts: Helpers for building image and canonical URLs and parsing how‑to‑use text into steps.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending color system, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing state, architecture notes, and completed feature for switching data URL to /data.json.
